question: How do I track my order?
answer: You can track your order by visiting our website and entering your order ID (e.g., ORD-1001) in the tracking section. You'll also find a tracking number in your shipping confirmation email.

question: What is your return policy?
answer: We offer a 30-day return policy for most items. Products must be in their original condition and packaging. Some electronic items have a 15-day return window. Contact us to initiate a return.

question: How long does shipping take?
answer: Standard shipping takes 5-7 business days. Express shipping takes 2-3 business days. Overnight shipping is available for an additional fee. Delivery times may vary based on your location.

question: How do I reset my password?
answer: Click the 'Forgot Password' link on the login page, enter your registered email, and we'll send you a password reset link. The link expires after 24 hours.

question: Do you offer international shipping?
answer: Yes, we ship to over 50 countries worldwide. International shipping typically takes 10-15 business days. Additional customs fees may apply depending on your country.

question: How do I contact customer support?
answer: You can reach us via this chat, email us at support@techstore.com, or call us at 1-800-TECH-HELP. Our support hours are Monday-Friday 9AM-6PM EST.

question: Can I change or cancel my order?
answer: Orders can be modified or cancelled within 2 hours of placement. After that, the order enters processing and cannot be changed. You can return it after delivery instead.

question: What payment methods do you accept?
answer: We accept Visa, MasterCard, American Express, PayPal, Apple Pay, and Google Pay. All transactions are secured with 256-bit SSL encryption.

question: Do you offer warranty on products?
answer: All products come with a minimum 1-year manufacturer warranty. Extended warranty options (2 or 3 years) are available at checkout for most electronics.

question: How do I apply a discount code?
answer: Enter your discount code in the 'Promo Code' field at checkout and click 'Apply'. Only one code can be used per order. Codes are case-sensitive and may have expiration dates.

question: What if my item arrives damaged?
answer: Contact us within 48 hours of delivery with photos of the damaged item. We'll arrange a free replacement or full refund. Keep the original packaging for the return.

question: How do I create an account?
answer: Click 'Sign Up' on our website, enter your email and choose a password. You can also sign up using your Google or Facebook account for faster registration.
